about_the_game:
The Upgraded Mega offers are waiting for you in the [NEW] Closers Platinum Package!
The [NEW] Platinum Pack consists of a full set Zenith Signature Costume that will mesmerize others with its ethereal look.
This pack also comes with three pieces of 3 different kinds of 90-days vouchers, the most powerful pet, and enhancing materials. These are all in one package!

Details:
1. Zenith Full Set Box X1
• 10 pieces of Zenith costume are included
• The costume pieces provided cannot be listed on Black Market

2. +15 Gear Booster X1
• 100% chance of enhancing your gear to +15

3. SS Guaranteed D Component: Gear X1
• 100% chance of the desired SS tuning option for your gear!

4. SS/S D Component : Costume X1
• Get your desired SS/S option for your costume as well!

5. Elite Pickup Pet Adult Container Selectable Box ver.1.9 X1
• Choose a special and powerful pet!

6. Elite Status (30-Day) X3
• Get 90 days of the premium buff and enjoy platinum status benefits including a daily subscription to one free washing machine!

7. Gardening Voucher (30-Day) X3
• Get 90 days of farm planting support!

8. Maid Service Voucher (30-Day) X3
• Get 90 days of My Room exploration support!

Notes:
• Zenith Costume is available for all characters including Aeri.
• DLC contents will be delivered to your in-game delivery box.
• DLC packs can only be received once per account. Once you purchased it, you won't be able to receive the same pack again as a gift.
• All DLC packs will be updated every after a new character release. After the update, new characters may able to use its components.
• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

The [NEW] Platinum Pack consists of a full set Zenith Signature Costume that will mesmerize others with its ethereal look.
This pack also comes with three pieces of 3 different kinds of 90-days vouchers, the most powerful pet, and enhancing materials. These are all in one package!

2. +15 Gear Booster X1

3. SS Guaranteed D Component: Gear X1

4. SS/S D Component : Costume X1

• Look forward to more packs that will be released on Steam and in-game!

name: [NEW] Closers Platinum Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050Ti or better graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
